mapper.insert: insert into feed(title, cont, mno, date, thumbnail) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{writer.no}, now(), #{thumbnail})
mapper.select: select f.fno, m.mno, m.nick, m.addr, m.thumbnail, f.title, f.cont, f.date, f.thumbnail feedThumbnail, f.likecnt from feed f join member m on m.mno = f.mno order by rand() Limit 15
select mno, nick, addr, thumbnail, intro from member where mno=#{writer.no}

select f.fno, m.mno, m.nick, m.addr, m.thumbnail, f.title, f.cont, f.date, f.thumbnail feedThumbnail, f.likecnt, fl.mno flmno from feed f join member m on m.mno = f.mno left join feed_like fl on f.fno=fl.fno where f.mno in (select following from follower where follow=#{writer.no}) order by f.fno desc

select f.fno, m.mno, m.nick, m.addr, m.thumbnail, f.title, f.cont, f.date, f.thumbnail feedThumbnail, f.likecnt, fl.mno flmno from feed f join member m on m.mno=f.mno left join feed_like fl on f.fno=fl.fno where m.nick=#{nick} order by f.fno desc

select f.fno, m.mno, m.nick, m.addr, m.thumbnail, f.title, f.cont, f.date, f.thumbnail feedThumbnail, f.likecnt, ff.feedfileno, ff.path from feed f join member m on m.mno = f.mno left outer join feed_file ff on f.fno = ff.fno where f.fno = #{value}

select f.fno, m.mno, m.nick, m.addr, m.thumbnail, f.title, f.cont, f.date, f.thumbnail feedThumbnail, ff.feedfileno, ff.path from feed f join member m on m.mno = f.mno left outer join feed_file ff on f.fno = ff.fno where f.fno = #{value}
